original: bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam mo //
translated: The “nectar” is the path to nirvana.

original: yongs skom zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs skom zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: “Thirst” is desire.

original: rum du zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni lhums na bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rum du zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni lhums na bzhugs pa'o //
translated: “Enters the womb” means dwelling in the womb.

original: tshun chad nas zhes bya ba ni de tshun chad nas brtsams nas so //
analyzed: tshun chad nas zhes bya ba ni de tshun chad nas brtsams nas so //
translated: “From then on” means from that time onward.

original: khrid par byed ces bya ba ni 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: khrid par byed ces bya ba ni 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: “Leads” means causes to enter.

original: sred pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: “Craving” is desire.

original: dra zhes bya ba ni dra ba ste gya gyur spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dra zhes bya ba ni dra ba ste gya gyur spyod pa'o //
translated: “Net” is a web, a deceitful action.

original: bkram pa zhes bya ba ni brkyang ba'o //
analyzed: bkram pa zhes bya ba ni brkyang ba'o //
translated: “Spread out” means extended.

original: spyod yas zhes bya ba ni yul mtha' yas pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: spyod yas zhes bya ba ni yul mtha' yas pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Infinite range” means having an infinite domain, the domain of nirvana.

original: gzhi med ces bya ba ni 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa gzhi med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi med ces bya ba ni 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa gzhi med pa'o //
translated: “Without ground” means transcending the five realms, being without ground.

original: gang gi gzhis ni zhes bya ba ni thabs gang gis so //
analyzed: gang gi gzhis ni zhes bya ba ni thabs gang gis so //
translated: “Whose ground?” means “by what means?”

original: rtsal yas zhes bya ba ni rtsal mtha' yas pa ste /
analyzed: rtsal yas zhes bya ba ni rtsal mtha' yas pa ste /
translated: “Infinite skill” means infinite skill in means.

original: ye shes kyi stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: and he possesses the power of immeasurable intuition.

original: gang rgyal mi nyams zhes bya ba ni gang rgyal ba nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gang rgyal mi nyams zhes bya ba ni gang rgyal ba nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: He is the one who is not defeated by the world, means that he is the one who is not defeated by the world.

original: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyis so //
analyzed: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyis so //
translated: The world refers to the world of sentient beings.

original: mi nyams zhes bya ba ni 'jig par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mi nyams zhes bya ba ni 'jig par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The one who is not defeated means that he is not destroyed.

original: gang la 'jig rten ma rgyal yang med pa zhes bya ba ni gang la 'jig rten na ye shes kyis ma rgyal ba 'ga' yang med pa'o //
analyzed: gang la 'jig rten ma rgyal yang med pa zhes bya ba ni gang la 'jig rten na ye shes kyis ma rgyal ba 'ga' yang med pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is not defeated by the world, means that there is no one in the world who is not defeated by his intuition.

original: tshigs bcad dang pos ni 'dod pa'i thabs kyis bkrir mi nus pa bstan to //
analyzed: tshigs bcad dang pos ni 'dod pa'i thabs kyis bkrir mi nus pa bstan to //
translated: The first verse shows that he cannot be led by the method of desire.

original: gnyis pas ni mthus bkrir mi nus pa bstan to //
analyzed: gnyis pas ni mthus bkrir mi nus pa bstan to //
translated: The second shows that he cannot be led by the method of power.

original: gsum pa dang bzhi pas ni yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' bas bkrir mi nus pa bstan to ;
analyzed: gsum pa dang bzhi pas ni yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' bas bkrir mi nus pa bstan to ;
translated: The third and fourth show that he cannot be led by the method of complete degeneration.

original: / tshe rabs brjes pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rnam grangs so //
analyzed: / tshe rabs brjes pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rnam grangs so //
translated: The change of lives refers to the change of births.

original: bla ma zhes bya ba ni mes po dang shes pa'i lung 'bogs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma zhes bya ba ni mes po dang shes pa'i lung 'bogs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The superior refers to the grandfather and the transmission of knowledge, etc.

original: bla ma'i gnas lta bu zhes bya ba ni bla ni dang 'dra ba dag go //
analyzed: bla ma'i gnas lta bu zhes bya ba ni bla ni dang 'dra ba dag go //
translated: The phrase “like the site of a guru” means “like a guru.”

original: tsham tshom med pa zhes bya ba ni zhugs shig ces mi zer bar ro //🔽sangs rgyas kyi @114a * //
analyzed: tsham tshom med pa zhes bya ba ni zhugs shig ces mi zer bar ro // sangs rgyas kyi @114a * //
translated: The phrase “without hesitation” means “without saying, ‘Enter!’”

original: mthu zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: mthu zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The phrase “the power of the Buddha” means “the cause of entry.”

original: lha rnams kyi mthu zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi mthu zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The phrase “the power of the gods” means “the cause of subsequent entry.”

original: byi dor zhes bya ba ni sbyang ba'o //
analyzed: byi dor zhes bya ba ni sbyang ba'o //
translated: The phrase “to sweep” means “to clean.”

original: khang chen zhes bya ba ni tshad chen te gnas la bdun nam brgyad la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: khang chen zhes bya ba ni tshad chen te gnas la bdun nam brgyad la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “a great house” means “a large house,” that is, one with seven or eight stories.

original: khang pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba ni khang khyim gyi gnas so //
analyzed: khang pa'i gzhi zhes bya ba ni khang khyim gyi gnas so //
translated: The phrase “the site of a house” means “the site of a home.”

original: lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin zhes bya ba ni sems kyi skad cig tu bsgrubs pas so //
analyzed: lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin zhes bya ba ni sems kyi skad cig tu bsgrubs pas so //
translated: The phrase “the gods are established by mind” means “established by a moment of mind.”

original: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sems gcig gi mod kho nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sems gcig gi mod kho nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase “by the mere generation of the thought” means “by the mere moment of the thought of emanation.”

original: sangs rgyas lung ma bstan pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs byas pa sangs rgyas nyid du ma bstan par ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lung ma bstan pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs byas pa sangs rgyas nyid du ma bstan par ro //
translated: The Buddha’s prediction is the prediction of Buddhahood, not of the factors of enlightenment.

original: sems can gyis zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'i sems can las gzhan pas so //
analyzed: sems can gyis zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'i sems can las gzhan pas so //
translated: By sentient beings means by sentient beings other than those who have been predicted.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni gang skyes nas yun ring du phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi skad cig mi phyogs pa ni dgag pa med do //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni gang skyes nas yun ring du phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi skad cig mi phyogs pa ni dgag pa med do //
translated: The irreversible mind is the mind that, once arisen, does not turn back for a long time. There is no prohibition against turning back.

original: mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gcod pa'i las so //
analyzed: mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gcod pa'i las so //
translated: The boundary is the action of the Saṅgha of Disciples in establishing a large boundary.

original: las kyi rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni las rnam par gzhag pa las kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: las kyi rgyu ba zhes bya ba ni las rnam par gzhag pa las kyi tshul lo //
translated: The course of action is the method of action, which is the establishment of action.

original: bdug pa zhes bya ba ni bdug spos dri zhim po'i snod nas du ba 'thul ba'o //
analyzed: bdug pa zhes bya ba ni bdug spos dri zhim po'i snod nas du ba 'thul ba'o //
translated: The incense is the smoke from a vessel of fragrant incense.

original: dar gyi chun po mang po zhes bya ba ni dar chun po brgya phrag mang po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dar gyi chun po mang po zhes bya ba ni dar chun po brgya phrag mang po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The many streamers are the many hundreds of streamers.

original: rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor la sogs pa'i dbang phyug go //
analyzed: rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor la sogs pa'i dbang phyug go //
translated: The king's great wealth is his sovereignty over his retinue and so forth.

original: rgyal po'i mthu chen po zhes bya ba ni yul bde zhing lo legs pa la sogs pa rgyal srid kyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i mthu chen po zhes bya ba ni yul bde zhing lo legs pa la sogs pa rgyal srid kyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: The king's great power is the fruit of his sovereignty, such as the happiness of his country and the abundance of his harvests.

original: lus ma btud ces bya ba ni lus gdung bar mi byed par ro //
analyzed: lus ma btud ces bya ba ni lus gdung bar mi byed par ro //
translated: He does not bend his body means that he does not torment his body.

original: ta la zhes bya ba ni srid du mi'i khru bdun yod do //
analyzed: ta la zhes bya ba ni srid du mi'i khru bdun yod do //
translated: A palm tree is seven cubits in height.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po shing rta lta bus thag ring por gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po shing rta lta bus thag ring por gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The four bases of supernormal power are like a chariot, because he travels far with them.

original: yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa'i bzhon pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kha lo bsgyur ba lta bus gang du gshegs bzhed pa'i yul du gshegs pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa'i bzhon pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kha lo bsgyur ba lta bus gang du gshegs bzhed pa'i yul du gshegs pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The vehicle of right effort is the vehicle of his horse, because his horse, which is his effort, is like a charioteer, and he goes wherever he wishes.

original: mi sman pa zhes bya ba ni mi ldan par ro //
analyzed: mi sman pa zhes bya ba ni mi ldan par ro //
translated: He does not go without his army means that he does not go without his retinue.

original: ji ltar khyod skus bzod pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dang du bzhes par mdzad cing thugs byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod skus bzod pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dang du bzhes par mdzad cing thugs byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: How your body is patient means how you are patient and do not become upset.

original: khrel 'dzem zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i chos dag la gus pa'o //
analyzed: khrel 'dzem zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i chos dag la gus pa'o //
translated: Modesty means respect for the uncontaminated dharmas.

original: ro mang ldan zhes bya ba ni sran tshod dang skyu rum mang po'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ro mang ldan zhes bya ba ni sran tshod dang skyu rum mang po'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Having many tastes means having the taste of many vegetables and sour fruits.

original: @114b ji ltar khyod kyi mgur du byon pa zhes bya ba ni gsol ba na ji ltar mgur du byon zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: @114b ji ltar khyod kyi mgur du byon pa zhes bya ba ni gsol ba na ji ltar mgur du byon zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: How you came to your throat means how you came to your throat when you were invited.

original: chos ldan dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba yang byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zag pa med pa'i yul lo /
analyzed: chos ldan dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba yang byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zag pa med pa'i yul lo /
translated: The joy of the Dharma means that joy also has the branches of enlightenment and is the object of the uncontaminated.

original: nges 'byung ldan zhes bya ba ni chags pa med pa'o //
analyzed: nges 'byung ldan zhes bya ba ni chags pa med pa'o //
translated: Possessing renunciation means being free from attachment.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir bsod snyoms spyod par mdzad snyam pa la /🔽zas sred spangs kyang 'jig rten kun //
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir bsod snyoms spyod par mdzad snyam pa la / zas sred spangs kyang 'jig rten kun //
translated: Then, why do you practice alms-round?🔽Though abandoning craving for food,

original: rjes su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed //
analyzed: rjes su gzung phyir bdag spyod byed //
translated: I practice for the sake of caring for the world.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: kham dang / reg pa dang / spong ba la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs kyang ngo //🔽yang tog gi gzhal med khang zhes bya ba ni khang pa'i gzhal med khang ngo //
analyzed: kham dang / reg pa dang / spong ba la sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs kyang ngo // yang tog gi gzhal med khang zhes bya ba ni khang pa'i gzhal med khang ngo //
translated: Even though he has abandoned all craving for the foods of morsel, contact, volition, and consciousness,🔽The palace of the vajra-holder🔽is in the center of the mandala of the sky.🔽In the center of the palace

original: steng zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs kyi steng gi gzhi na'o //🔽dus mthun zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dus tshigs rnams dang mthun par ro //
analyzed: steng zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs kyi steng gi gzhi na'o // dus mthun zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dus tshigs rnams dang mthun par ro //
translated: is the seat of the lotus and moon.🔽On it, the Bhagavat

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni kun du spyod pa'o //🔽goo ta ma zhes bya ba ni rgyal po la bod pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni kun du spyod pa'o // goo ta ma zhes bya ba ni rgyal po la bod pa'o //
translated: sits in the vajra posture.🔽The Bhagavat, the vajra-holder,🔽is the color of the autumn moon.🔽He is adorned with all the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks

original: 'jigs kun rtse zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa'o //🔽srid ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i srid pa la sogs pa srid pa gsum po dag go //
analyzed: 'jigs kun rtse zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa'o // srid ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i srid pa la sogs pa srid pa gsum po dag go //
translated: and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks🔽and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and minor marks

original: bag nyal bcas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bag nyal bcas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: and is endowed with the major and minor marks.🔽He is adorned with the major and

original: spangs pas zhes bya ba ni rang nyid spangs pa dang / de'i dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas so ;
analyzed: spangs pas zhes bya ba ni rang nyid spangs pa dang / de'i dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas so ;
translated: By abandoning means by abandoning it oneself and by abandoning the afflictions that focus on it.

original: / khrus mchog ces bya ba ni ga bur la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i skyu ru ra'i shu pa la sogs pa khrus kyi yo byad dag gis so //
analyzed: / khrus mchog ces bya ba ni ga bur la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i skyu ru ra'i shu pa la sogs pa khrus kyi yo byad dag gis so //
translated: Supreme bath means with the articles of bathing, such as the myrobalan fruit mixed with camphor and so on.

original: chos rdzing zhes bya ba ni lam ste rdzing dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rdzing zhes bya ba ni lam ste rdzing dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The pond of Dharma means the path, because it is like a pond.

original: bsod nams 'bram zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams 'bram zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The hundred thousand merits means engaging in ethics.

original: rnyog pa med ces bya ba ni zag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnyog pa med ces bya ba ni zag pa med pa'o //
translated: Unpolluted means uncontaminated.

original: yi lus mi gsher zhes bya ba ni rgyud la sred pa med pa'o //
analyzed: yi lus mi gsher zhes bya ba ni rgyud la sred pa med pa'o //
translated: The body is not moist means there is no craving in the mindstream.

original: rig byed yon tan zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rtog pa la sogs pa shes pa'i yan lag dag gis so //
analyzed: rig byed yon tan zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rtog pa la sogs pa shes pa'i yan lag dag gis so //
translated: The qualities of the Vedas means by the branches of knowledge such as correct conception.

original: pha rol 'gro zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol 'gro zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o //
translated: Going to the other side means going to nirvana.

original: zil gnon zhes bya ba ni mi gus pa'o //
analyzed: zil gnon zhes bya ba ni mi gus pa'o //
translated: Subjugation means disrespect.

original: 'jigs skrag ces bya ba ni 'jigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'jigs skrag ces bya ba ni 'jigs pa nyid do //
translated: Fear means fear itself.

original: yid 'byung ces bya ba ni mi phyogs so //
analyzed: yid 'byung ces bya ba ni mi phyogs so //
translated: “Disillusioned” means turned away from the world.

original: 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / snyan pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi kun du spyod pa dag @115a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / snyan pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi kun du spyod pa dag @115a * //
translated: “By the eight worldly concerns” means by the worldly activities of pleasure and pain, fame and obscurity, praise and blame, gain and loss.

original: gis so ; / legs par 'khrungs pa zhes bya ba ni khyad du 'phags par skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gis so ; / legs par 'khrungs pa zhes bya ba ni khyad du 'phags par skyes pa'o //
translated: “Well-born” means born into a superior family.

original: dad rgyas pas zhes bya ba ni dad pa mngon par 'phel bas so //
analyzed: dad rgyas pas zhes bya ba ni dad pa mngon par 'phel bas so //
translated: “With faith” means with faith that has increased.

original: drang srong zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: drang srong zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: “Sage” means a Buddha Bhagavat.

original: dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun no //
analyzed: dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun no //
translated: “Saṅgha” means the Noble Saṅgha.

original: sdig pa 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam pa'o //
translated: “Desire for evil” means an afflicted attitude.

original: nga rgyal las nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog de bzhin gshegs pa pas kyang mtho bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal las nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog de bzhin gshegs pa pas kyang mtho bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.🔽The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.

original: rjes su 'jug par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni dbang du byed pa'o //🔽gcugs par gyur pa dga' ston pa //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni dbang du byed pa'o // gcugs par gyur pa dga' ston pa //
translated: The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.

original: zhes bya ba ni gcugs par gyur phas de dang lhan cig bag dbab pa byas pa'o //🔽'jig rten pa'i thugs zhes bya ba ni che ge mo zhig 'od bar gyur cig snyam du bzhed pa'i thugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gcugs par gyur phas de dang lhan cig bag dbab pa byas pa'o // 'jig rten pa'i thugs zhes bya ba ni che ge mo zhig 'od bar gyur cig snyam du bzhed pa'i thugs so //
translated: The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.🔽The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.🔽The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.🔽The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.

original: thub pa'i nyan thos mthu che ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thub pa'i nyan thos mthu che ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.🔽The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.

original: mthu che ba zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mthu che ba zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.

original: gsum rig ces bya ba ni rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gsum rig ces bya ba ni rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.🔽The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.🔽The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.🔽The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.🔽The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the one who is loved by the one who is delighted.🔽The phrase with the desire to follow means to bring under one's control.🔽The phrase the one who is loved, the one who is delighted means the

original: sems kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi sems yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi sems yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: The “knowledge of the variety of minds” is the skill in knowing the minds of others.

original: zag pa zad par gyur pa dang / dgra rnams bcom pa mang du yod ces bya ba ni zag pa zad pa dgra bcom par gyur pa yin gyi ming tsam gyis ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zag pa zad par gyur pa dang / dgra rnams bcom pa mang du yod ces bya ba ni zag pa zad pa dgra bcom par gyur pa yin gyi ming tsam gyis ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Many are the vanquishers of the enemy, the exhaustion of the contaminants,” means that they are arhats who have exhausted the contaminants, not merely by name.

original: mngon par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i sar chud pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i sar chud pa'o //
translated: “They have entered” means that they have entered the stage of the āryas.

original: glo ba thag pa las zhes bya ba ni srog gi mthar thug pa nas snying nas skyabs su 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: glo ba thag pa las zhes bya ba ni srog gi mthar thug pa nas snying nas skyabs su 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “From the bottom of their hearts” means that they go for refuge from the depths of their hearts until the end of their lives.

original: rnyed pa'i phyir dang nye ba zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dag gi rgyu ni mang du thos pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i phyir dang nye ba zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dag gi rgyu ni mang du thos pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “For the sake of gain and honor” means that the cause of gain is being learned and so on.

original: shin tu dka' ba yin gyi zhes bya ba ni gnod pa yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu dka' ba yin gyi zhes bya ba ni gnod pa yin gyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “It is very difficult” means that it is harmful.

original: rdul gyi rdzab 'dra ba khyod la mi bra ba ci yod ces bya ba ni rdul dang rdul du 'dres pa'i rdzab 'dra ba khyod btang du mi bra ba ci yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdul gyi rdzab 'dra ba khyod la mi bra ba ci yod ces bya ba ni rdul dang rdul du 'dres pa'i rdzab 'dra ba khyod btang du mi bra ba ci yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: What is the meaning of the statement, “You are not allowed to abandon this filthy substance like dust?” It means, “What is the reason you are not allowed to abandon this filthy substance like dust that is mixed with dust?”🔽“Bhikshus who offer the poṣadha” means that the actions of the bhikṣuṇīs are all different from those of the bhikṣus except for the invitation ceremony at the end of the rainy season retreat.

original: dge slong ma gso sbyong 'bul ba dag ces bya ba ni dge slong ma rnams kyi las ni rdzogs par bsnyen pa dgag dbye ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad dge slong dang tha dad pa nyid yin la dge slong ma rnams kyi gso sbyong ni @115b dge slong
analyzed: dge slong ma gso sbyong 'bul ba dag ces bya ba ni dge slong ma rnams kyi las ni rdzogs par bsnyen pa dgag dbye ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad dge slong dang tha dad pa nyid yin la dge slong ma rnams kyi gso sbyong ni @115b dge slong
translated: The poṣadha of the bhikṣuṇīs is accomplished in accordance with the saṅgha of bhikṣus.

original: gi dge 'dun dang mthun pa 'grub pa rnams kyi bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gi dge 'dun dang mthun pa 'grub pa rnams kyi bya ba yin te /
translated: The accomplishment of accordance is the action of the bhikṣuṇī saṅgha.

original: mthun pa sgrub pa yang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun pa gso sbyong dbul ba'i dge slong ma gnyis yan chad bskos pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis de len pa'i dge slong bskos pa sgo gang na sdod pa la phul bas bsgrub dgos pas de dbul ba'i dge
analyzed: mthun pa sgrub pa yang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun pa gso sbyong dbul ba'i dge slong ma gnyis yan chad bskos pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis de len pa'i dge slong bskos pa sgo gang na sdod pa la phul bas bsgrub dgos pas de dbul ba'i dge
translated: The poṣadha is offered by two or more bhikṣuṇīs who are appointed to offer the poṣadha to the bhikṣu saṅgha. It must be accomplished by offering it to the bhikṣu who is appointed to receive it and who is staying at the gate.

original: slong ma zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: slong ma zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of “begging” is the same as before.

original: g-yengs ma zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par g-yengs ba'o //
analyzed: g-yengs ma zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par g-yengs ba'o //
translated: “Distracted” means the mind is distracted.

original: rgya cang dag lcag pod dang / shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dag gis bar chad kyang byas las zhes bya ba ni de dag dge slong ma las thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgya cang dag lcag pod dang / shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dag gis bar chad kyang byas las zhes bya ba ni de dag dge slong ma las thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Interrupted” means interrupted by the noise of the king’s court, such as the sound of drums, flutes, lutes, and singing.

original: mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba zhes bya ba ni skra spra ba'i me tog ltar dkar ba'o //
analyzed: mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba zhes bya ba ni skra spra ba'i me tog ltar dkar ba'o //
translated: “Pale like a jasmine flower” means the hair is white like a jasmine flower.

original: gnod pa chung ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i nang nyung ba'o //
analyzed: gnod pa chung ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i nang nyung ba'o //
translated: “Little harm” means little internal disease.

original: nyam nga ba chung ba zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi gnod pa'i nyam nga ba chung ba'o //
analyzed: nyam nga ba chung ba zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi gnod pa'i nyam nga ba chung ba'o //
translated: “Little danger” means little external danger.

original: bde ba zhes bya ba ni chos gos la sogs pa yo byad 'byor ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba zhes bya ba ni chos gos la sogs pa yo byad 'byor ba'o //
translated: “Happy” means having the requisites such as Dharma robes.

original: bsnyun mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni lan 'ga' 'byung ba'i bsnyun dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: bsnyun mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni lan 'ga' 'byung ba'i bsnyun dang bral ba'o //
translated: “Healthy” means free from occasional illness.

original: bla mkhyen zhes bya ba ni btsun mo 'khor gyi zhal ta pa'o //
analyzed: bla mkhyen zhes bya ba ni btsun mo 'khor gyi zhal ta pa'o //
translated: “Wise” means the chief queen.

original: gtam shes so zhes bya ba ni rgyus shes so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gtam shes so zhes bya ba ni rgyus shes so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase one who knows the story means one who knows the reason.

original: rag mang du las kyi zhes bya ba ni lung nod pa rdzogs par bsnyen pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rag mang du las kyi zhes bya ba ni lung nod pa rdzogs par bsnyen pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase one who has done much work means one who has completed the study of the scriptures, etc.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.

original: brtad pa ci 'byung na zhes bya ba ni nyams pa ci yod na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽bdag nyid kyi lag rang la sos 'debs par byed dam zhes bya ba ni sgye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ni bdag dang 'dra bas de las log pa mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: brtad pa ci 'byung na zhes bya ba ni nyams pa ci yod na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // bdag nyid kyi lag rang la sos 'debs par byed dam zhes bya ba ni sgye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ni bdag dang 'dra bas de las log pa mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.

original: bshang pa byed 'dod dam zhes bya ba ni bshang pa bro ba'o //🔽sten pa byed pa zhes bya ba ni goms par byed pa la sogs pa'i rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: bshang pa byed 'dod dam zhes bya ba ni bshang pa bro ba'o // sten pa byed pa zhes bya ba ni goms par byed pa la sogs pa'i rtsom pa'o //
translated: The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.

original: goms par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'bring du byed pa'o //
analyzed: goms par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'bring du byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.

original: lan mang du byed pa zhes bya ba ni cher byed pa'o //
analyzed: lan mang du byed pa zhes bya ba ni cher byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase one who is in a hurry means one who is in a state of decline.🔽The phrase one who is

original: rjes su srung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa bzlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su srung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa bzlog par byed pa'o //
translated: “Protecting” means preventing backsliding.

original: reg par byed pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
analyzed: reg par byed pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
translated: “Touching” means the determination of knowledge.

original: mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'thob pa bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'thob pa bsgrub pa'o //
translated: “Realizing” means accomplishing attainment.

original: bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed ces bya ba ni bdag nyid srung na gzhan la mi gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid srung na gzhan srung bar byed ces bya ba ni bdag nyid srung na gzhan la mi gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Protecting oneself, one protects others” means that when one protects oneself, one does not harm others.

original: tho mi 'tshams pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i gegs mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: tho mi 'tshams pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i gegs mi byed pa'o //
translated: “Not being violent” means not obstructing the desires of others.

original: mi gshe ba zhes bya ba ni khro ba mi bskyed pa'o //🔽mi 'tshe ba zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod @116a * //
analyzed: mi gshe ba zhes bya ba ni khro ba mi bskyed pa'o // mi 'tshe ba zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod @116a * //
translated: “Not being angry” means not arousing anger.

original: pa mi bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: pa mi bsgrub pa'o //
translated: “Not harming” means not accomplishing what is not desired.

original: rjes su brtse ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su brtse ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa bsgrub pa'o //
translated: “Being compassionate” means accomplishing what is desired.

original: rjes su snying brtse ba zhes bya ba ni sems mgu bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su snying brtse ba zhes bya ba ni sems mgu bar byed pa'o //
translated: “Being sympathetic” means gladdening the mind.

original: byams pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni phan pa'i bsam pa nyid dang mi 'dod pa gcad pa'i bsam pa nyid do //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni phan pa'i bsam pa nyid dang mi 'dod pa gcad pa'i bsam pa nyid do //
translated: “Having a mind of friendliness” means having a thought of benefit and a thought of cutting off what is not desired.

original: gzhan srung ba na bdag nyid srung bar byed do zhes bya ba ni sems khro ba la sogs pa sdig pa las log pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan srung ba na bdag nyid srung bar byed do zhes bya ba ni sems khro ba la sogs pa sdig pa las log pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When protecting others, one protects oneself. This is because one turns away from evil such as anger.

original: chos bzang po'i chos kyis zhes bya ba ni bya ba gang la chos bzang po'i cho ga yod pa'i chos kyis so //
analyzed: chos bzang po'i chos kyis zhes bya ba ni bya ba gang la chos bzang po'i cho ga yod pa'i chos kyis so //
translated: By the Dharma of good Dharma means by the Dharma that has the rite of good Dharma.

original: gtam sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni tshig sna tshogs so //
analyzed: gtam sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni tshig sna tshogs so //
translated: Various stories means various words.

original: gtam snyan pa zhes bya ba ni tshig dga' ba'o //
analyzed: gtam snyan pa zhes bya ba ni tshig dga' ba'o //
translated: Pleasant stories means delightful words.

original: spobs pa dge ba zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i shes rab po //
analyzed: spobs pa dge ba zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i shes rab po //
translated: Virtuous eloquence means wisdom that is in accord with Dharma.

original: du gu la'i gos zhes bya ba ni rtsva du gu la'i tshal pa las byas pa'o //
analyzed: du gu la'i gos zhes bya ba ni rtsva du gu la'i tshal pa las byas pa'o //
translated: Dugula cloth is made from the leaves of the dugula plant.

original: ko tam pa'i gos zhes bya ba ni rtsva ko tam pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: ko tam pa'i gos zhes bya ba ni rtsva ko tam pa las byung ba'o //
translated: Koṭamba cloth is made from the koṭamba plant.

original: nyi 'og gi gos zhes bya ba ni mtha' 'khob nas byung ba zab dar la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyi 'og gi gos zhes bya ba ni mtha' 'khob nas byung ba zab dar la sogs pa'o //
translated: Foreign cloth is from the border regions, such as deep red silk.

original: thal mos brdebs pa zhes bya ba ni thal lcag go //
analyzed: thal mos brdebs pa zhes bya ba ni thal lcag go //
translated: Clapping is with the palms.

original: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / nye du ma yin par yid gnyis za ba ni dngos gzhi nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / nye du ma yin par yid gnyis za ba ni dngos gzhi nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If a nun who is not a relative is perceived as not a relative, and if there is doubt that she is not a relative, then the actual basis is just that.

original: dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pa dang nye du ma yin par yid gnyis za ba ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'gres bzhi smos so //
analyzed: dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pa dang nye du ma yin par yid gnyis za ba ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'gres bzhi smos so //
translated: If a nun who is a relative is perceived as not a relative, and if there is doubt that she is not a relative, then there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 'khrur 'jug pa la sogs pa 'dod pa tha dad na re re la yang ltung ba re rer 'gyur la sbyor ba gcig na gnyis la yang ltung ba gcig tu 'gyur ba dang sbyor ba gcig na gsum char la yang mthar ltung ba gcig tu 'gyur ba bstan
analyzed: 'khrur 'jug pa la sogs pa 'dod pa tha dad na re re la yang ltung ba re rer 'gyur la sbyor ba gcig na gnyis la yang ltung ba gcig tu 'gyur ba dang sbyor ba gcig na gsum char la yang mthar ltung ba gcig tu 'gyur ba bstan
translated: The four permutations are stated in order to show that if the desires for washing and so on are different, then there is an offense for each, and if the preparations are the same, then there is one offense for two, and if the preparations are the same, then there is one offense for all three.

original: pa'i phyir 'gres bzhi po re re la yang ltung ba bcu bcu rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: pa'i phyir 'gres bzhi po re re la yang ltung ba bcu bcu rnam par gzhag go //
translated: In order to show this, each of the four permutations is presented as having ten downfalls.

original: shin tu gos kyis cha ba las sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni gos bzang por bya ba'i phyir rtsol pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu gos kyis cha ba las sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni gos bzang por bya ba'i phyir rtsol pa'o //
translated: The preparation is called “very well covered with cloth” because of the effort to make it into good cloth.

original: bden pa dag ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni yo byad la lhag par chags pas skyo ba ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa dag ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni yo byad la lhag par chags pas skyo ba ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “They have not seen the truths” means that they have not generated the disgust that comes from being attached to material things.

original: smad na zhes bya ba ni tshig dngos su smra bas smad na'o //
analyzed: smad na zhes bya ba ni tshig dngos su smra bas smad na'o //
translated: “If they are criticized” means if they are criticized with direct words.

original: dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de dag nga rgyal bcad pa yin pas tshig mi snyan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dbral dka' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de dag nga rgyal bcad pa yin pas tshig mi snyan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “They become difficult to correct” means that they become difficult to correct because they have cut off pride. The meaning is that they become difficult to speak to.

original: ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa las byung ba'i ltung byed 'chags su gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: ltung byed kyi ltung ba byed du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa las byung ba'i ltung byed 'chags su gzhug pa'o //
translated: “They should be made to acknowledge a downfall that is a transgression” means that they should be made to acknowledge a downfall that arises from disrespect.

original: zla ba shol ma bor zhes bya ba ni zla ba lhag par ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba shol ma bor zhes bya ba ni zla ba lhag par ma byas pa'o //
translated: “They should not be allowed to skip a rainy season retreat” means that they should not be allowed to skip a rainy season retreat.

original: zla ba shol bor ba zhes bya ba ni zla @116b ba lhag par byas pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba shol bor ba zhes bya ba ni zla @116b ba lhag par byas pa'o //
translated: “They should be allowed to skip a rainy season retreat” means that they should be allowed to skip a rainy season retreat.

original: bstod pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo nyid bstod pa'o //
analyzed: bstod pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo nyid bstod pa'o //
translated: “Praise” means praise of their essential nature.

original: bkur ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu bstod pa'o //
analyzed: bkur ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu bstod pa'o //
translated: “Honor” means praise of their results.

original: bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis byas pa'i dris pa lan gdab pas so //
analyzed: bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis byas pa'i dris pa lan gdab pas so //
translated: Praise is the answer to questions asked by others.

original: rab tu bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pa'i yon tan la rjes su yi rang bas so //
analyzed: rab tu bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis smras pa'i yon tan la rjes su yi rang bas so //
translated: Praise is the rejoicing in the good qualities spoken by others.

original: khrims ni gang lags zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bya ba'i khrims so //
analyzed: khrims ni gang lags zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bya ba'i khrims so //
translated: What is morality? is the morality of constant practice.

original: khrims bgyi ba ni gang lags zhes bya ba ni glo bur du bya ba'i khrims so //
analyzed: khrims bgyi ba ni gang lags zhes bya ba ni glo bur du bya ba'i khrims so //
translated: What is the practice of morality? is the morality of occasional practice.

original: rnyed pa chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa zhes bya ba ni dang po kho nas thob pa'i bsod snyoms nges par longs spyod cing gzhan mi tshol ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa chog pa'i bsod snyoms pa zhes bya ba ni dang po kho nas thob pa'i bsod snyoms nges par longs spyod cing gzhan mi tshol ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The alms-begging monk who is satisfied with what he gets is one who, from the very beginning, uses the alms-food he has obtained and does not seek more.

original: phying pa pa zhes bya ba ni phying pa las byas pa'i chos gos gsum 'chang ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: phying pa pa zhes bya ba ni phying pa las byas pa'i chos gos gsum 'chang ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The mat-possessor is one who wears the three robes made of rags.

original: cog pu pa zhes bya ba ni mi nyal bar cog pu kho nar 'dug pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: cog pu pa zhes bya ba ni mi nyal bar cog pu kho nar 'dug pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The cross-legged one is one who sits cross-legged without lying down.

original: gzhi ji bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni dang po bting ba kho na'i steng du nyal gyi bdag gis gding ba dang gzhan 'ding du mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par byas te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhi ji bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni dang po bting ba kho na'i steng du nyal gyi bdag gis gding ba dang gzhan 'ding du mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'i yongs su spang ba sbyin par byas te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase “just as it was laid out” means that one should give up the practice of lying down only on the bed that was laid out for oneself, and not allowing others to lay out a bed for oneself.

original: re zhig dang por khrims su bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir dang / khyed kyi yul la khrims su bya ba ma byas pa'i phyir khyod la ltung ba med la /
analyzed: re zhig dang por khrims su bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir dang / khyed kyi yul la khrims su bya ba ma byas pa'i phyir khyod la ltung ba med la /
translated: The phrase “you have no offense” means that you have no offense because you did not do what was required of you, and because you did not do what was required of you in your region.

original: da phyin chad kyang khyod kyi yul la khrims su bya ba med pa kho na yin pas khyod la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi ltung bas gleng ba'i dogs pa med par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir dang / sh'akya rab tu byung ba rnams la yang bskul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da phyin chad kyang khyod kyi yul la khrims su bya ba med pa kho na yin pas khyod la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi ltung bas gleng ba'i dogs pa med par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir dang / sh'akya rab tu byung ba rnams la yang bskul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “from now on” means that you should not be concerned about being accused of an offense by your fellow brahmacārin, because there is no longer any requirement for you to do what is required of you in your region, and because the Śākyas who have gone forth are also urged to do the same.

original: rgyud dag pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i kun du spyod pa med pa'i lus so //
analyzed: rgyud dag pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i kun du spyod pa med pa'i lus so //
translated: The phrase “a pure stream” means a body that is free of the conduct of desire.

original: rgyud dag pa'i tshul dag gis zhes bya ba ni sred pa'i sems dag gis so ;
analyzed: rgyud dag pa'i tshul dag gis zhes bya ba ni sred pa'i sems dag gis so ;
translated: “With pure intentions” means with minds free from craving.

original: / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i bya ba dag gis so //
analyzed: / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul dag gis zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i bya ba dag gis so //
translated: “With pure conduct” means with certain actions.

original: sred pa med pa zhes bya ba ni nye du la chags pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa med pa zhes bya ba ni nye du la chags pa med pa'o //
translated: “Without craving” means without attachment to relatives.

original: len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni yo byad 'dod pa med pa'o //
analyzed: len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni yo byad 'dod pa med pa'o //
translated: “Without grasping” means without desire for possessions.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni yid la 'dod pa'o //🔽sgyu thabs zhes bya ba ni g-yos so //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni yid la 'dod pa'o // sgyu thabs zhes bya ba ni g-yos so //
translated: “Desire” means mental desire.🔽“Deception” means deceit.

original: 'phye bo nyid ces bya ba ni grum pa nyid do //🔽mchongs pa zhes bya ba ni mchong zhing 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'phye bo nyid ces bya ba ni grum pa nyid do // mchongs pa zhes bya ba ni mchong zhing 'gro ba'o //
translated: “Crippled” means lame.🔽“Jumping” means leaping.

original: dkyus mo zhes bya ba ni rgyug cing 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: dkyus mo zhes bya ba ni rgyug cing 'gro ba'o //
translated: “Running” means racing.

original: gcugs med par gnod pa zhes bya ba ni gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: gcugs med par gnod pa zhes bya ba ni gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: “Harm without affection” means attachment to what is improper.

original: ched du bsams te zhes bya ba ni sgyu thabs kyi rgyu nyid do //🔽gdung chad pa zhes bya @117a * //
analyzed: ched du bsams te zhes bya ba ni sgyu thabs kyi rgyu nyid do // gdung chad pa zhes bya @117a * //
translated: “Intentionally” means the cause of deceit.

original: ba ni rgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: ba ni rgyu med pa'o //
translated: “Without a son” means without a cause.

original: sman pa gnyer te zhes bya ba ni sman pa dag gis bskor te'o //
analyzed: sman pa gnyer te zhes bya ba ni sman pa dag gis bskor te'o //
translated: “Surrounded by physicians” means surrounded by doctors.

original: gang gcad par bya zhes bya ba ni rkang lag la sogs pa gcad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gcad par bya zhes bya ba ni rkang lag la sogs pa gcad par bya ba'o //
translated: “What is to be cut” means hands, feet, and so on, that are to be cut off.

original: gang gcod du gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ni rkang lag la sogs pa gcod du gzhug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gcod du gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ni rkang lag la sogs pa gcod du gzhug par bya ba'o //
translated: “What is to be made to cut” means hands, feet, and so on, that are to be made to cut.

original: dong zhes bya ba ni sa thams cad du gzhug pa'i dong ngo //
analyzed: dong zhes bya ba ni sa thams cad du gzhug pa'i dong ngo //
translated: “Pit” means a pit into which all are to be thrown.

original: glen pa ma lags zhes bya ba ni brda mi phrad pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: glen pa ma lags zhes bya ba ni brda mi phrad pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Not stupid” means not lacking in understanding.

original: blo med min zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid sems mi shes pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: blo med min zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid sems mi shes pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: “Not lacking in intelligence” means not lacking in self-awareness.

original: gsal bar bgyid pa'i zhes bya ba ni lce dang rkan dang sna la sogs pa rgyu gzhan dag gis so //
analyzed: gsal bar bgyid pa'i zhes bya ba ni lce dang rkan dang sna la sogs pa rgyu gzhan dag gis so //
translated: “Made clear” means by other causes, such as the tongue, palate, and nose.

original: smra ba zhes bya ba ni smra ba po'o /
analyzed: smra ba zhes bya ba ni smra ba po'o /
translated: “Speech” means the speaker.

original: dbang po tshang ba zhes bya ba ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po tshang ba zhes bya ba ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Complete faculties” means having all the faculties.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma nyams pa'o //
translated: “Clear” means not impaired.

original: rigs mthun zhes bya ba ni rigs kyis 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs mthun zhes bya ba ni rigs kyis 'ongs pa'o //
translated: “Of the same kind” means that it is of the same class.

original: rab tu zhes bya ba ni shin tu'o //
analyzed: rab tu zhes bya ba ni shin tu'o //
translated: “Very” means extremely.

original: mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: “Unceasing” means that it occurs continuously.

original: drag po zhes bya ba ni rnon po'o //
analyzed: drag po zhes bya ba ni rnon po'o //
translated: “Violent” means sharp.

original: 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'jigs 'jigs lta ste des ni mi bzad pa dang drag po nyid bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'jigs 'jigs lta ste des ni mi bzad pa dang drag po nyid bstan pa'o //
translated: “Terrible” means fearful. This teaches that it is unbearable and violent.

original: mchi mi bgyi zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchi mi bgyi zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar mi bya ba'o //
translated: “Do not weep” means do not go.

original: dka' thub kyis gdung ba zhes bya ba ni du ba rngub pa la sogs pa dka' thub drag po byed pa'o //
analyzed: dka' thub kyis gdung ba zhes bya ba ni du ba rngub pa la sogs pa dka' thub drag po byed pa'o //
translated: “Tormenting yourself with austerities” means practicing severe austerities such as inhaling smoke.

original: sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni rgyun du mer sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ces bya ba ni rgyun du mer sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
translated: “Sacrifices” means continuously making offerings into the fire.

original: mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni rta'i tshil la sogs pas mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
analyzed: mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni rta'i tshil la sogs pas mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
translated: “Sacrificial rites” means performing sacrifices with horse fat, and so on.

original: kim pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni shing kim pa ka'i 'bras bu ste mig sngar sdug cing gsod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: kim pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni shing kim pa ka'i 'bras bu ste mig sngar sdug cing gsod par byed pa yin no //
translated: “Fruits of the kimshuka tree” means the fruits of the kimshuka tree, which are beautiful at first but cause death.

original: bdud rtsi'i ro dga' ba zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang bar dang tha mar zhi ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i ro dga' ba zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang bar dang tha mar zhi ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The taste of nectar is called “joy” because it is peaceful in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: gnas mal 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni reg pa 'jam pa'i shing bal dag go //
analyzed: gnas mal 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni reg pa 'jam pa'i shing bal dag go //
translated: A soft bed is a soft bed of cotton.

original: legs par bshams par zhes bya ba ni legs par bting ba'o //
analyzed: legs par bshams par zhes bya ba ni legs par bting ba'o //
translated: Well-prepared means well-spread.

original: gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gang nas kyang mi 'jigs pa'o //🔽bred ngas kyi 'jigs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gang nas kyang mi 'jigs pa'o // bred ngas kyi 'jigs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Free from fear means free from fear of anything.

original: bred ngas zhes bya ba ni sdar ma ste de 'jigs pa gang yin pa de bred ngas kyis 'jigs pa ste de dang ldan pa'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: bred ngas zhes bya ba ni sdar ma ste de 'jigs pa gang yin pa de bred ngas kyis 'jigs pa ste de dang ldan pa'i sems kyis so //
translated: Fearful means timid. Fear is what is feared by the timid.

original: shing shun zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'i shun pa'o //
analyzed: shing shun zhes bya ba ni shing ljon pa'i shun pa'o //
translated: Bark is the bark of trees.

original: rtsva gyon zhes bya ba ni rtsva dang lha'i gos so //
analyzed: rtsva gyon zhes bya ba ni rtsva dang lha'i gos so //
translated: Wearing grass means wearing grass and divine garments.

original: thos nas zhes bya ba ni brtags sam khong du chung nas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thos nas zhes bya ba ni brtags sam khong du chung nas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Having heard means having examined or understood.

original: mchi mas @117b brnangs pa zhes bya ba ni mchi mas rnam par dkrugs pa'i mgrin pas so //
analyzed: mchi mas @117b brnangs pa zhes bya ba ni mchi mas rnam par dkrugs pa'i mgrin pas so //
translated: Choked with tears means with a throat disturbed by tears.

original: bu blangs zhes bya ba ni bu la 'khyud nas so //
analyzed: bu blangs zhes bya ba ni bu la 'khyud nas so //
translated: Embracing his son means embracing his son.

original: brtul zhugs nges 'chang zhing zhes bya ba la brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag gi nges pa'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs nges 'chang zhing zhes bya ba la brtul zhugs zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag gi nges pa'o //
translated: Firm in his vow means firm in his physical and verbal [vows].

original: nges pa zhes bya ba ni yid kyis yang dag par sdom pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba ni yid kyis yang dag par sdom pa'o //
translated: Firm means fully restrained in mind.

original: rang gi chos zhes bya ba ni drang srong gi chos so //
analyzed: rang gi chos zhes bya ba ni drang srong gi chos so //
translated: His own Dharma means the Dharma of the sages.

original: byams pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni byams pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya ba ni byams pa thob pa'o //
translated: One of loving nature means one who has attained love.

original: snying rje dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni snying rje thob pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni snying rje thob pa'o //
translated: Compassionate means one who has attained compassion.

original: brtse ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnod pa dag la bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: brtse ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnod pa dag la bsrung ba'o //
translated: Kind means protecting those who are harmed.

original: sems can la byams pa dang zhes bya ba ni byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sems can la byams pa dang zhes bya ba ni byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Loving to sentient beings means having a loving intention.

original: ri dags kyi bu brtul zhugs can zhes bya ba ni ri dags dang 'dra ba'i yi dam sngar blangs te spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ri dags kyi bu brtul zhugs can zhes bya ba ni ri dags dang 'dra ba'i yi dam sngar blangs te spyod pa'o //
translated: The one called the ascetic who is like a deer is one who has previously taken a deity that is like a deer and practices.

original: 'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba ste bzhi pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'khrur 'jug pa'i spang ba ste bzhi pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the fourth root downfall is finished.

original: // /'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dgag pa'i phyir 'gog pa ste de la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: // /'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dgag pa'i phyir 'gog pa ste de la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: One who has entered the absorption of cessation is one who has entered cessation for the sake of stopping the mind and mental factors.

original: skal ba zhes bya ba ni bgo skal lo //
analyzed: skal ba zhes bya ba ni bgo skal lo //
translated: A share is a portion.

original: nags byul ba zhes bya ba ni nags brtag pa'o //
analyzed: nags byul ba zhes bya ba ni nags brtag pa'o //
translated: To investigate the forest is to examine the forest.

original: mtho yor zhes bya ba ni rdo la sogs pa bsgreng ba'o //
analyzed: mtho yor zhes bya ba ni rdo la sogs pa bsgreng ba'o //
translated: A cairn is a pile of stones and so forth.

original: bsod snyoms kyi phud ces bya ba ni bsod snyoms dang po'i mchog go //
analyzed: bsod snyoms kyi phud ces bya ba ni bsod snyoms dang po'i mchog go //
translated: The first portion of alms is the best of the alms.

original: nang par zhes bya ba ni nang par sngar ro //
analyzed: nang par zhes bya ba ni nang par sngar ro //
translated: In the morning means earlier in the morning.

original: nyin mo nyid ces bya ba ni snga dro'i nyin mo'o //
analyzed: nyin mo nyid ces bya ba ni snga dro'i nyin mo'o //
translated: The day itself means the morning of the day.

original: lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar lha'i gnas su zas phul ba'i lhag ma bkra shis pa'i phyir 'dod par bya ba de bzhin du te por gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar lha'i gnas su zas phul ba'i lhag ma bkra shis pa'i phyir 'dod par bya ba de bzhin du te por gsol zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Like the leftovers in the gods’ abode. Just as the leftovers from the food offering in the gods’ abode are to be desired because they are auspicious, so too is the cloth. The meaning is: “it is to be accepted.”

original: dge slong ma'i ras ma zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma'i ras ros so ;
analyzed: dge slong ma'i ras ma zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma'i ras ros so ;
translated: “Cloth of a nun” means cloth that belongs to a nun.

original: / khur bdag bslang zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: / khur bdag bslang zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa'o //
translated: “To be taken back” means to be taken back together with the basis of training.

original: de la brje ba ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni brje ba'i tshul ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de la brje ba ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni brje ba'i tshul ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “This is the exchange” means “this is the method of exchange.”

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni rin ma nyams pas brje bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni rin ma nyams pas brje bar bya ba'o //
translated: “To that extent” means to that extent that the value is not lost.

original: ji tsam gyis dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni ring chung dus kyang dge slong ma gang dang lhan cig de brje bar byed pa'i dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ji tsam gyis dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni ring chung dus kyang dge slong ma gang dang lhan cig de brje bar byed pa'i dge slong ma dga' bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “To the extent that the nun is pleased” means to the extent that the nun who is exchanging that cloth with the monk is pleased.

original: len pa'i spang ba ste lnga pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: len pa'i spang ba ste lnga pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The fifth rule is completed.

original: // / kha zas tsam zhes bya ba ni kha zas tsam du 'god pa'o //🔽chang chung @118a * //
analyzed: // / kha zas tsam zhes bya ba ni kha zas tsam du 'god pa'o // chang chung @118a * //
translated: The word just means only.

original: tsam zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba tsam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tsam zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba tsam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The word little means just enough for survival.

original: rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba ni gsher ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba ni gsher ba'o //
translated: The word concordant means moist.

original: bshes pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: bshes pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba'o //
translated: The word friend means connected.

original: da ni dus kyi phyed kyis zhes bya ba ni mthus 'phrog pa'i phyed kyis so //
analyzed: da ni dus kyi phyed kyis zhes bya ba ni mthus 'phrog pa'i phyed kyis so //
translated: Now, the words half the time mean half the time by force.

original: spyod pas zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i dang tshul lo //
analyzed: spyod pas zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i dang tshul lo //
translated: The word conduct means the way of engaging.

original: shing tshal zhes bya ba ni dbyig gu tshal pa'o //
analyzed: shing tshal zhes bya ba ni dbyig gu tshal pa'o //
translated: The word forest means a forest of sticks.

original: grong phreng ba can zhes bya ba ni grong phreng ba can zhes bya ba nas skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grong phreng ba can zhes bya ba ni grong phreng ba can zhes bya ba nas skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word village means a village of houses.

original: tshang tshing zhes bya ba ni rtsva thibs po'o //
analyzed: tshang tshing zhes bya ba ni rtsva thibs po'o //
translated: The word thicket means a thicket of grass.

original: de la des ni dus yin no zhes bya ba yang tshig tu bzlas pa ni bsnan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de la des ni dus yin no zhes bya ba yang tshig tu bzlas pa ni bsnan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The words that is the time for him are repeated in the text for emphasis.

original: de las lhag pa med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de las lhag pa med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of “no more than that.”

original: rin thang zhes bya ba ni rin no //
analyzed: rin thang zhes bya ba ni rin no //
translated: “Value” means price.

original: kha dog ces bya ba ni kha dog gi gzugs so //
analyzed: kha dog ces bya ba ni kha dog gi gzugs so //
translated: “Color” means the form of color.

original: khru tshad ces bya ba ni khru gang ngo //
analyzed: khru tshad ces bya ba ni khru gang ngo //
translated: “Handspan” means one cubit.

original: lhag ma thob na ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni des lhag pa ma bslangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag ma thob na ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni des lhag pa ma bslangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “There is no offense if he obtains more than that” means that he did not ask for more than that.

original: kha dog dang tshad las lhag pa yang de bzhin du shes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog dang tshad las lhag pa yang de bzhin du shes par byed pa'o //
translated: “More than the color and size” should be understood in the same way.

original: slong ba'i spang ba ste drug pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slong ba'i spang ba ste drug pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The sixth permutation of the training rule on begging has been completed.

original: // / bsdams pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par byas shing dam por byas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: // / bsdams pas zhes bya ba ni khyad par byas shing dam por byas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Binding” means “making a distinction” and “making it tight.”

original: phyi rol tu zas la bos pa zhes bya ba ni mgron du bos pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol tu zas la bos pa zhes bya ba ni mgron du bos pa'o //
translated: “Invited outside for a meal” means invited as a guest.

original: bya rog dkar po dang 'dra bas zhes bya ba ni dge slong hral po yin pas 'jig rten dag gis ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya rog dkar po dang 'dra bas zhes bya ba ni dge slong hral po yin pas 'jig rten dag gis ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Like a white crow” means that because he is a corrupt monk, he is recognized by the world.

original: bar bar du rgan pa dag gis 'khod par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni bar bar dag tu gzhon nu dag gis bcad de rgan pa dag gis 'khod par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bar bar du rgan pa dag gis 'khod par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni bar bar dag tu gzhon nu dag gis bcad de rgan pa dag gis 'khod par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: And from time to time the elders should arrange it. This means that from time to time the young should cut it and the elders should arrange it.

original: dngar kha byas te zhes bya ba ni gral thabs su sbrengs te'o //
analyzed: dngar kha byas te zhes bya ba ni gral thabs su sbrengs te'o //
translated: They should do it with affection means they should do it in a friendly way.

original: kha cig na re sgro gu bsgrogs pa'o zhes kyang zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re sgro gu bsgrogs pa'o zhes kyang zer ro //
translated: Some say it means they should do it in a row.

original: yo byad bcu gsum bdun bdun zhes bya ba ni gsal rgyal la sogs pa sbyin bdag bdun gyis re res kyang yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum byin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yo byad bcu gsum bdun bdun zhes bya ba ni gsal rgyal la sogs pa sbyin bdag bdun gyis re res kyang yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum byin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Thirteen articles, seven by seven means that each of the seven benefactors, beginning with Prasenajit, gave thirteen articles each.

original: mi brtson pa zhes bya ba ni sems kyis mi brtson pa bstan to //
analyzed: mi brtson pa zhes bya ba ni sems kyis mi brtson pa bstan to //
translated: Not diligent means not diligent in mind.

original: mi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag gis mi sbyor ba bstan to //
analyzed: mi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag gis mi sbyor ba bstan to //
translated: Not applying oneself means not applying oneself in body and speech.

original: ma brtags par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa sngon du ma song bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma brtags par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa sngon du ma song bar byed pa'o //
translated: Practicing without examination means acting without prior consideration.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni bram ze 'am khyim bdag dad pa can de las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni bram ze 'am khyim bdag dad pa can de las so //
translated: From him means from that faithful brahmin or householder.

original: khru bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni srid du'o //
analyzed: khru bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni srid du'o //
translated: Twelve cubits long means in length.

original: gal te chung na yang bslang bar mi bya la lhag na yang sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba mi khyim pa'i gos bskyed bri nges pa yin pa'i @118b phyir ro ;
analyzed: gal te chung na yang bslang bar mi bya la lhag na yang sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba mi khyim pa'i gos bskyed bri nges pa yin pa'i @118b phyir ro ;
translated: If it is smaller, it should not be asked for, and if it is larger, it should not be given. This is because the measure of a householder's robe is fixed.

original: / gal te chung na yang bslang bar bya la lhag na yang sbyin par bya ba ni dge slong gi tshad nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / gal te chung na yang bslang bar bya la lhag na yang sbyin par bya ba ni dge slong gi tshad nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is smaller, it should be asked for, and if it is larger, it should be given. This is because the measure of a monk's robe is fixed.

original: thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lhag pa slong ba'i phyir dang / lhag ma bcabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lhag pa slong ba'i phyir dang / lhag ma bcabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It becomes a downfall that requires confession in all cases means that it is a downfall that requires confession because of asking for more and because of concealing the excess.

original: slong bar rigs pa spang ba ste bdun pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slong bar rigs pa spang ba ste bdun pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the seventh root downfall is finished.

original: // / de dag dang bdag mnyam par zhes bya ba ni de dang bdag 'dra bar ro //
analyzed: // / de dag dang bdag mnyam par zhes bya ba ni de dang bdag 'dra bar ro //
translated: Equal to me means equal to me.

original: snga ma la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni ma bslangs pa nyid du thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni ma bslangs pa nyid du thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no offense if one obtains it without asking.

original: spags pa las lhag pa slong ba'i spang ba ste brgyad pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: spags pa las lhag pa slong ba'i spang ba ste brgyad pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The eighth training rule on asking for more than that has been completed.

original: // / khyo shug ces bya ba ni skyes pa dang bud med do //
analyzed: // / khyo shug ces bya ba ni skyes pa dang bud med do //
translated: Husband and wife refers to a man and a woman.

original: bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ni sbyin bdag gcig ma yin pa'i phyir logs shig tu smos so //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ni sbyin bdag gcig ma yin pa'i phyir logs shig tu smos so //
translated: This training rule is stated separately because it is not the same donor.

original: gleng gzhi dang bslab pa dang bcas pa dang ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig gi don ni snga ma kho na bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gleng gzhi dang bslab pa dang bcas pa dang ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig gi don ni snga ma kho na bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the words of the introduction, the training, and the rule should be understood as before.

original: so so nas spags pa las lhag pa slong ba'i slang ba ste dgu pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: so so nas spags pa las lhag pa slong ba'i slang ba ste dgu pa'i tshig rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ninth training rule on asking for more than what was agreed upon has been completed.

original: // / snying tshom zhes bya ba ni bkrabs pa'o //🔽sgra mthon po zhes bya ba ni skad chen po'o //
analyzed: // / snying tshom zhes bya ba ni bkrabs pa'o // sgra mthon po zhes bya ba ni skad chen po'o //
translated: A dowry is a gift given to a bride.🔽A loud voice is a loud sound.

original: sgra yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni snyan pa'o //
analyzed: sgra yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni snyan pa'o //
translated: A pleasant sound is a pleasant sound.

original: sgra zab bo zhes bya ba ni mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir sgra gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sgra zab bo zhes bya ba ni mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir sgra gsal ba'o //
translated: Deep sound means a clear sound because it is powerful.

original: mi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni yid la gcags pa'o //
analyzed: mi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni yid la gcags pa'o //
translated: Disagreeable means unpleasant.

original: sgra dma' ba zhes bya ba ni skad chung pa'o //🔽sgra yid du mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni sgra mi snyan pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dma' ba zhes bya ba ni skad chung pa'o // sgra yid du mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni sgra mi snyan pa'o //
translated: Low sound means a small voice.🔽Unpleasant sound means an unpleasant sound.

original: sgra zhum pa zhes bya ba ni mi dga' ba'i skad do //
analyzed: sgra zhum pa zhes bya ba ni mi dga' ba'i skad do //
translated: Depressed sound means a sad voice.

original: brgyal zhes bya ba ni dus tshigs bzung ba'o //
analyzed: brgyal zhes bya ba ni dus tshigs bzung ba'o //
translated: Fainting means holding the season.

original: brgya lam na zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: brgya lam na zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bzung ba'o //
translated: Once in a while means holding the day.

original: zur gyis go zhes bya ba ni zur tsam gyis go ba ste lag brda la sogs pas kyang brda phrad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zur gyis go zhes bya ba ni zur tsam gyis go ba ste lag brda la sogs pas kyang brda phrad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By implication means understanding by just a hint, because one can also communicate by gestures and so on.

original: brjod na zhes bya ba ni mgo smos pas go ba ste cung zhig brjed pas lhag ma zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod na zhes bya ba ni mgo smos pas go ba ste cung zhig brjed pas lhag ma zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If expressed means understanding by mentioning the beginning, because the remainder is understood by a little expression.

original: yi ge phyed kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma spros pas go bas te /
analyzed: yi ge phyed kyis zhes bya ba ni rnam par ma spros pas go bas te /
translated: By half a syllable means understanding without elaboration.

original: yi ge phyed brjod pas thams cad shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge phyed brjod pas thams cad shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because everything is understood by expressing half a syllable.

original: mi smras na mi shes so zhes bya ba ni bkri dgos pa ste /
analyzed: mi smras na mi shes so zhes bya ba ni bkri dgos pa ste /
translated: If you do not speak, we will not know.🔽 This is the need for guidance,

original: ril gyis ma smras kyi bar du mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ril gyis ma smras kyi bar du mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you will not know until you speak everything.

original: phan tshun med pa zhes bya ba ni yang rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun med pa zhes bya ba ni yang rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Mutual absence means that the continuity is not broken.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni len pa rnams la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //🔽yul gyi khe spogs zhes @119a * //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni len pa rnams la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro // yul gyi khe spogs zhes @119a * //
translated: Absence of defilement means that there is no defilement in the appropriating.

original: bya ba ni yul gzhan du byin pa'i nor las yul gzhan du khe spogs kyi skyed 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni yul gzhan du byin pa'i nor las yul gzhan du khe spogs kyi skyed 'thob pa'o //
translated: Profit from the country means that profit is obtained from the interest on money lent in another country.

original: sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba nas kyang 'bar ba'o //🔽rgya ma bying dam zhes bya ba ni rgya drud pas ma byid dam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba nas kyang 'bar ba'o // rgya ma bying dam zhes bya ba ni rgya drud pas ma byid dam zhes bya'o //
translated: The burning lamp means that it is burning from the root.🔽The seal is not broken means that the seal has not been broken by dragging.

original: ma zhu 'am zhes bya ba ni rgya ma tshig gam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ma zhu 'am zhes bya ba ni rgya ma tshig gam zhes pa'o //
translated: Is it not digested? means Is the seal not burned?

original: sgyu ma zhugs sam zhes bya ba ni rgya la sgyu thabs ma byas sam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma zhugs sam zhes bya ba ni rgya la sgyu thabs ma byas sam zhes pa'o //
translated: Is the illusion entered? means Is the seal not made with a magical device?

original: gom pa bskyed de zhes bya ba ni gom pa cher 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: gom pa bskyed de zhes bya ba ni gom pa cher 'dor ba'o //
translated: Striding means taking a big step.

original: rtug pa la dad pa zhes bya ba ni khyod rtug pa tsam la dad pa yin gyi sbyin pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtug pa la dad pa zhes bya ba ni khyod rtug pa tsam la dad pa yin gyi sbyin pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Faith in excrement means that you have faith in just excrement, not in giving, worship, and so on. This is the meaning.

original: sgyid pa gnyis skrangs skrangs su zhes bya ba ni skrangs par gyur gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: sgyid pa gnyis skrangs skrangs su zhes bya ba ni skrangs par gyur gyi bar du'o //
translated: Swollen means swollen up.

original: bram ze gtsang sgra can zhes bya ba ni sde ba sbyar klog pa ste chung ma ma blangs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bram ze gtsang sgra can zhes bya ba ni sde ba sbyar klog pa ste chung ma ma blangs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The pure brahmin means one who has not taken a wife.

original: zhal ta byed pa zhes bya ba ni las byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhal ta byed pa zhes bya ba ni las byed pa'o //
translated: Attendant means servant.

original: rung ba byed pa zhes bya ba ni lha 'bangs sam rtse dgod do //
analyzed: rung ba byed pa zhes bya ba ni lha 'bangs sam rtse dgod do //
translated: Fit means a god or a jester.
